title: Chemical Guys HOL126 14-Piece Arsenal Builder Car Wash Kit with Foam Gun, Bucket and (5) 16 oz Car Care Cleaning Chemicals (Works w/Garden Hose)
description: Upgrade to the Chemical Guys Car Wash Bucket Kit With Foam Blaster 6 Foam Gun, and find out the professional detailer's secret to the perfect scratch free shine at every car wash. Are you still washing your car with one bucket, dish soap, and old beach towels? It's no wonder your car looks like it was painted with a broom Improper washing and drying is the leading cause of swirl marks and scratches, and lack of waxing promotes corrosion and clear coat failure. The Car Wash Bucket Kit With Foam Gun is the perfect combination of products to give any first timer, hardcore enthusiast, or professional detailer the perfect car wash every time.
